scripts.server: npm run clean:next && npx tsc -p src-nexpress && node main/index.js -dev
scripts.start: npm run clean:next && npx tsc -p src-nexpress && npx tsc -p src && npx next build src && npx minifier main && npx minifier src/.next && node main/index.js
scripts.electron: npm run clean:next && npx tsc -p src-nextron && npx electron main/src-nextron/index.js
scripts.pack:win: npm run clean:next && npx rimraf build && npx license-checker --production > AUTHORS && npx next build src && npx next export src && npx tsc -p src-nextron && npx minifier ./main && electron-builder --win --dir
scripts.build:types: npx rimraf @bizhermit && npx cpx src-react-sdk/**/*.{ts,tsx} @bizhermit/react-sdk/dist && npx tsc -p src-react-sdk/tsconfig.types.json --emitDeclarationOnly && npx rimraf @bizhermit
scripts.build: npx rimraf dist && npm run license && npx tsc -p src-react-sdk/tsconfig.dist.json && npx rimraf dist/test.js dist/test.d.ts && npx minifier ./dist && npx rimraf ./dist/cli.d.ts && npm run build:types
scripts.postpublish: git tag && git push origin tags/v%npm_package_version% && node ./imitation
